channel.title: HELP!With compile and runserver
channel.description: i have downloaded a source to edit, but when i go runserver it comes up with a black box and then the box goes away and nothing further happens, so someone told me to compile it so i tried that but it come up with "javac not recognized", i have hamachi and i have java as i have played before but could someone please help me with this? :confused:

item.title: HELP!With compile and runserver
item.dc:creator: @PKEDURDADHA PKEDURDADHA
item.description:
@PKEDURDADHA wrote:

yep, i changed em now ive just got to test them[br][size=1]Posted on: April 30, 2007, 07:07:48 AM[/size][hr]k the cmpile box opens but does nothing further, and the runserver box opens then closes too fast to read anything and nothing further happens[br][size=1]Posted on: April 30, 2007, 07:11:10 AM[/size][hr]the compile box now reads " Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Press any key to continue . . ." what do i do now?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 30, 2007, 07:13:28 AM[/size][hr]and runserver box now reads" Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
config\objects.cfg: file not found.

Read full topic
